title: Stream: Apes & Horses – Bleu Nuit
content:
Following on from the release of the EP’s lead track, Parisian dream-pop outfit Apes & Horses have made the rest of their debut EP available to stream.

Bolder and more anthemic than previous outings would suggest, Minuit is deliriously uplifting, whereas EP closer Blue is a swirling, atmospheric number, littered with glowing guitar lines, verging towards post-rock. Check out the full EP below, and pick up the EP here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
